concept.title: L1 data-side memory system
concept.shortdesc: The L1 data memory system has the following features:

ul.li: Virtually Indexed, Physically Tagged (VIPT), which behaves as a Physically Indexed, Physically Tagged (PIPT) 4-way set-associative L1 data cache.
Fixed cache line length of 64 bytes.
256-bit write interface from the L2 memory system.
256-bit read interface from the L2 memory system.
Two 128-bit paths from the data L1 memory system to the datapath.
256-bit write path from the datapath to the L1 memory system.
